system.description: Whenever scoring a Critical Effect against a Creature of Hulking Size or Larger, add +3 Damage. Does not apply to servitors, Daemons, or entities with the From Beyond Trait.
system.benefit: Whenever scoring a Critical Effect against a Creature of Hulking Size or Larger, add +3 Damage. Does not apply to servitors, Daemons, or entities with the From Beyond Trait.

prerequisites.text: Feral Warrior Alternative Advance, 200xp, WS 35, BS 35

system.notes: Bonus applies to Hulking+ size creatures only. Excludes servitors, daemons, and From Beyond entities.

combat.condition: On Critical Hits against Hulking+ size creatures (not servitors/daemons)
